title: Denzel is never the 'same act ' twice
review: In this action flick Denzel's character is nailed down in detail and once again he is different in the film than any previous role- motivations behind his necessary use of violence to obtain justice are evident by all witnesses bullying and abuse by the forces that he skillfully disablembles!

title: Don't give up on your dreams
review: After a bit of worrying that this would be one more stereotype about midlife crisis and/ or teen ansgst... turns into Clever Comedy with funny laughs memorable scenes and motivation to maybe even try something new
